Key Match Events: The Phoenix Suns lost their fourth game in a row on Saturday against the Indiana Pacers, dropping to a 15-18 record for the season.
The Indiana Pacers cruised to a 126-108 win over the Phoenix Suns.
Kevin Durant had 25 points, seven rebounds, and seven assists.
Devin Booker put up 20 points, eight rebounds, and nine assists.
Post-Match Reflections: NBA fans are ready to give up on the Phoenix Suns after their loss to the Indiana Pacers.
Fans expressed disappointment in the Suns' performance and suggested starting a rebuild.
